name: Maariful Quran English - Mufti Muhammad Shafi
description: Maariful Quran (Urdu:  ) is an eight-volume tafsir (exegesis) of the Quran written by Pakistani Islamic scholar Mufti Muhammad Shafi (18971976). Originally written in Urdu, it is the most prominent work of its author.  App Features:  Complete Tafseer Maariful Quran in English Language Latest Material Design UI Three Different Arabic Fonts Four Different English Fonts Multiple Color Themes Customize Arabic Font Size and Color Customize English Font Size and Color Save Unlimited Bookmarks Continue from Last Read Ayah Share Ayah with or without Translation and Tafseer Customize Layout: List/Slider Quick Jump to Ayah  Do read and benefit from this app insha Allah and help us spread the message of Islam to as many people as possible.  Also, do give your feedback about the app.  Jazk Allhu Khayran
